Sqls.sql: SELECT TOP 20 * FROM {0} with(nolock) WHERE SiteSysNo={1} ORDER BY PeriodNum DESC

SELECT CONVERT(NCHAR(40),BJ.RetNum) as Name, COUNT(BJ.RetNum) AS Total FROM {1} BJ with(nolock) JOIN dbo.UseSite US with(nolock) ON BJ.SiteSysNo=US.SysNo WHERE BJ.SiteSysNo=:SITE_SYS_NO AND BJ.PeriodNum>:MIN_PERIOD {0} GROUP BY BJ.RetNum

( SELECT RC.BigOrSmall AS Name, COUNT(RC.BigOrSmall) AS Total FROM {1} BJ with(nolock) JOIN dbo.ResultCategory_28 RC with(nolock) ON BJ.RetNum=RC.RetNum JOIN dbo.UseSite US with(nolock) ON BJ.SiteSysNo=US.SysNo WHERE BJ.SiteSysNo=:SITE_SYS_NO {0} GROUP BY RC.BigOrSmall ) UNION ALL ( SELECT RC.MiddleOrSide AS Name, COUNT(RC.MiddleOrSide) AS Total FROM {1} BJ with(nolock) JOIN dbo.ResultCategory_28 RC with(nolock) ON BJ.RetNum=RC.RetNum JOIN dbo.UseSite US with(nolock) ON BJ.SiteSysNo=US.SysNo WHERE BJ.SiteSysNo=:SITE_SYS_NO {0} GROUP BY RC.MiddleOrSide ) UNION ALL ( SELECT RC.OddOrDual AS Name, COUNT(RC.OddOrDual) AS Total FROM {1} BJ with(nolock) JOIN dbo.ResultCategory_28 RC with(nolock) ON BJ.RetNum=RC.RetNum JOIN dbo.UseSite US with(nolock) ON BJ.SiteSysNo=US.SysNo WHERE BJ.SiteSysNo=:SITE_SYS_NO {0} GROUP BY RC.OddOrDual )

SELECT COUNT(1) Total, :PAGE_INDEX PageIndex, :PAGE_SIZE PageSize, CEILING(COUNT(1)/CONVERT(DECIMAL,:PAGE_SIZE)) AS [PageCount] FROM {1} BJ with(nolock) JOIN dbo.UseSite US with(nolock) ON BJ.SiteSysNo=US.SysNo JOIN dbo.ResultCategory_28 RC with(nolock) ON BJ.RetNum=RC.RetNum WHERE BJ.SiteSysNo=:SITE_SYS_NO AND BJ.PeriodNum>:MIN_PERIOD {0}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BJ.PeriodNum, BJ.RetTime, BJ.RetNum, RC.BigOrSmall, RC.MiddleOrSide, RC.OddOrDual, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BJ.PeriodNum DESC) AS ROW FROM {1} BJ with(nolock) JOIN dbo.UseSite US with(nolock) ON BJ.SiteSysNo=US.SysNo JOIN dbo.ResultCategory_28 RC with(nolock) ON BJ.RetNum=RC.RetNum WHERE BJ.SiteSysNo=:SITE_SYS_NO AND BJ.PeriodNum>:MIN_PERIOD {0} ) AS TEMP WHERE ROW>(:PAGE_INDEX-1)*:PAGE_SIZE AND ROW<:PAGE_INDEX*:PAGE_SIZE

DECLARE @MAX_P INT SELECT @MAX_P=MAX(PeriodNum) FROM dbo.SourceData_28_Beijing SELECT MAX(PeriodNum) AS NearPeriod ,MAX(RetNum) AS [Number] ,(@MAX_P-MAX(PeriodNum)) AS [Interval] FROM dbo.SourceData_28_Beijing with(nolock) GROUP BY RetNum

( SELECT RC.BigOrSmall AS Name ,COUNT(RC.BigOrSmall) AS Total
FROM {0} BJ with(nolock) INNER JOIN dbo.ResultCategory_28 RC with(nolock) ON BJ.RetNum=RC.RetNum INNER JOIN DBO.UseSite US with(nolock) ON BJ.SiteSysNo=US.SysNo WHERE BJ.RetTime BETWEEN :START_DATE AND :END_DATE AND US.SysNo=:SiteSysNo GROUP BY RC.BigOrSmall ) union ( SELECT RC.MiddleOrSide AS Name ,COUNT(RC.MiddleOrSide) AS Total
FROM {0} BJ with(nolock) INNER JOIN dbo.ResultCategory_28 RC with(nolock) ON BJ.RetNum=RC.RetNum INNER JOIN DBO.UseSite US with(nolock) ON BJ.SiteSysNo=US.SysNo WHERE BJ.RetTime BETWEEN :START_DATE AND :END_DATE AND US.SysNo=:SiteSysNo GROUP BY RC.MiddleOrSide ) union ( SELECT RC.OddOrDual AS Name ,COUNT(RC.OddOrDual) AS Total
FROM {0} BJ with(nolock) INNER JOIN dbo.ResultCategory_28 RC with(nolock) ON BJ.RetNum=RC.RetNum INNER JOIN DBO.UseSite US with(nolock) ON BJ.SiteSysNo=US.SysNo WHERE BJ.RetTime BETWEEN :START_DATE AND :END_DATE AND US.SysNo=:SiteSysNo GROUP BY RC.OddOrDual ) union ( SELECT convert(nvarchar(40),RetNum) as Name, COUNT(RetNum) AS Total FROM {0} BJ with(nolock) INNER JOIN dbo.UseSite US with(nolock) ON BJ.SiteSysNo=US.SysNo WHERE (RetTime BETWEEN :START_DATE AND :END_DATE) AND US.SysNo=:SiteSysNo GROUP BY RetNum )

SELECT BJ.PeriodNum, BJ.RetTime, BJ.RetNum, RC.BigOrSmall, RC.MiddleOrSide, RC.OddOrDual FROM {0} BJ with(nolock) JOIN dbo.ResultCategory_28 RC with(nolock) ON BJ.RetNum=RC.RetNum WHERE (BJ.RetTime BETWEEN '{1}' AND '{2}') AND BJ.SiteSysNo={3} order by BJ.PeriodNum DESC
